litigation.title: Litigation and Arbitration
litigation.question: What Are Litigation and Arbitration Services?
description: Litigation and arbitration services involve legal representation provided to individuals and companies to resolve disputes efficiently and effectively. This includes advocacy before courts of all types and levels, as well as comprehensive support in arbitration proceedings before specialized tribunals and institutions.

Under the right granted to us by the Saudi Code of Law Practice, we have worked since our first year on accumulated applications in the Saudi market. This enhanced our legal skills in the field of litigation services and enabled us to successfully manage and settle many disputes. Therefore, we at Alshangiti & Associates Law Firm aim to employ our experience to support our clients by litigating before courts, quasi-judicial bodies, arbitration centers, and panels.

Litigation before the Saudi judiciary requires mastery of both formal and substantive aspects due to its unique nature. The main legal documents, such as the judiciary system, undergo rapid changes due to restructuring classifications of cases and courts at all levels. Complementary principles, decisions, and regulations issued by various judicial authorities may not always be accessible to non-specialists.

One of the most common misconceptions is assigning litigation to an unlicensed local provider or an unqualified foreign one unfamiliar with legislative and structural developments. Some cases may seem complex to outsiders but are straightforward for us as a specialized provider. Conversely, we can simplify complex matters. Therefore, the decision to assign such tasks must follow sound governance.

Through our extensive professional experience managing disputes, documented in our (Set of Rulings) publication, each ruling includes the claim statement, defense memoranda, applicable laws, and judges’ reasoning. This internal knowledge base ensures our reliability and depth of understanding.

After more than 20 years of providing dispute management services in the business sector, we have developed deep familiarity with commercial, administrative, labor, and criminal courts, as well as administrative committees with judicial authority, where institutions often appear to protect their activities.
Our efforts extend beyond courtroom litigation to professional mediation, settlements, and arbitration representation in accordance with agreed terms or arbitration clauses.

We prioritize the quality of defense strategies, implement them carefully, communicate them transparently, and collaborate with clients through periodic reports and pre-submission reviews of pleadings and memoranda.
litigation.cta: Don’t let disputes escalate — contact us today.
